title: Twirl by Kate Spade New York Eau De Parfum, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
description: Twirl by Kate Spade New York Eau de Parfum, 1.7 Fluid Ounces encapsulates the floral fragrance of a garden in bloom, finished with a twist of fresh fruit. It's the perfect cocktail, so to speak -- equally at ease at an afternoon lawn party or a night on the town. Cheers.Captivating day-to-night fragrancePink watermelon mingles with blackberry and red currantEnhanced with a heart of fresh flowers, including orange blossom, star jasmine, tiare flower, and sweet magnoliaFinished with luminous musks and a touch of French macaron1.7 fluid ounces (50 milliliters)Our Signature Fragrance, Infused with a Dash of Joie de VivrePink watermelon mingles with blackberry and red currant and is enhanced with a heart of fresh flowers, including orange blossom, star jasmine, tiare flower and sweet magnolia. The fragrance is finished with luminous musks and a touch of French macaron (straight from the patisserie, of course).Top: pink watermelon mingles with blackberry and red currant.Middle: enhanced with a heart of fresh flowers, including orange blossom, star jasmine, and sweet magnolia.Bottom: finished with luminous musks and a touch of French macaron.The CollectionEau de parfum: the signature scent, infused with a dash of joie de vivreBody cream: the creme de la cremeBody lotion: a light-as-air layer for morning and nightShower gel: a bit of bubbly for the bath or showerThe CompanyAt Kate Spade New York, we love colored tights and sparkly heels, festive fetes and tables for two. We believe in celebrations both big and small, and when it came time to design our signature scent, we created a fragrance infused with joie de vivre.What's in the BoxTwirl by Kate Spade New York Eau de Parfum, 1.7 Fluid Ounces.

title: Maybelline New York Fit Me! Concealer, 30 Cafe, 0.23 Fluid Ounce
description: Flawless that lets the real you come through. It's makeup that doesn't mess with you. No oils. No waxes. No nonsense. Natural coverage that leaves skin the way it was meant to be: fresh, breathing, natural. Exclusive translucent base and lightweight pigments allow skin's natural highs and lows to show through. Non comedogenic, dermatologist tested, ophthalmologist tested, fragrance free.

title: Maybelline New York Full 'N Soft Waterproof Mascara, Very Black 311, 0.28 Fluid Ounce
description: This mascara builds full, soft thick lashes without the brittle feel. Prevents loss of lashes with patented quick dissolve system that allows easy mascara removal. Won't run, smear or smudge. No clumps, no globs. Contact lens safe and hypoallergenic. Waterproof; also available in washable formula.

title: Maybelline New York Volum' Express Falsies Flared Washable Mascara, Blackest Black 286, 0.31-fluid Ounce
description: Now, false lash glam goes flared. Up, out and over the top, instantly. Our exclusive spoon brush loads lashes with massive volume and presses them into a flared arch while our flexible-hold formula with pro-key fiber provides a lasting curve.

title: Estee Lauder Resilience Lift Firming / Sculpting Face and Neck Creme SPF 15 for Normal / Combination .5 oz / 15 ml
description: An anti-fatigue hydrating lotion for men Helps instantly tone & awaken skin after shaving or cleansing Removes impurities from skin Infused with a refreshing scent Prepares skin for following hydrating regimen Skin appears clean & energetic
